div.p:
Curia legalis burgi de abirdene xxvjto die mensis Junij Anno et cetera xlvijmo
Quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata et cetera

Item eodem die thomas andirson' in amerciamento curie pro eo quod non comparuit ad prosequendum
plegium per e eum extensum super sororem suam relictam quondam andream Johnson' et ipse
quietus de calumpnia eius quousque de nouo citetur

Assisa posuit in dilacione Inquisicionem domini thome baile capellani quousque post
penes Scaccarium et cetera absque preiudicio cuiuscumque partis

The assis' has decretyt that syn maystir Johne of cadyow and Richarde of Kyntor
as procuratouris to gilbert meignes ressauit a certan of wyne for xxti markis of
monee the quhilkis was awande to the said' gilbert be diuers' dettouris that the said'
maystir Johne and Richarde sall suer' that thai cuthe get nane vthir' payment
bot the fornemnyt wyne for the said' xxto markis and that thai schippit it apon' the
said gilbertis awintur' and til his profite and this sworne thai ar quyt the quhilkis
gif thai do noucht thai ar dettouris to the said' gilbert of the forsaid' xxti
markis

Memorandum that this fornemnyt athe was perofferit to maystir Johne of cadyow and to
Richarde of Kyntor forsaidis in the court in presens of the bailyeis the quhilkis
athe thai reffoysit to suer' tharfor it was giffin for doume be the dempstar'
that the said' maystir Johne and Richarde sulde pay to the said gilbert xij li'
within lachfull tyme

The assis' has ordanyt anens the hors that Wilyame scherar' clamys maystir Johne
of cadyow of that how mekill that Wilyam scherar' may preve that his hors was
worth' that tyme that he deliueryt him to the said' maystir Johne with men that saw
him and kende him that tyme the saide maystir Johne sal content him tharof as law
will'

Anence the action movit betuex Richard Ruthirfurd' procuratour' to thom talyhefer'
and agotson' of berwik and on thair' behalf agaynis Androw broysour'
for xx Inglis nobillis / the said parties ar submittit til thir' persounes
vndirwrittin that is to say John' the vaus John of Scrogs John marr'
thom blyndseil John gray patrik badenach' / til mak ane end as thaim
think at law will

Robertus lurdane primo die vocatus ad sectam Simonis blabre pro vno boue precii xx s' et
vj s' monete non comparuit quare

Donald blakburn primo die vocatus ad sectam patricij quhite pro xxxvj s' et a harnas'
barell' and a prikkin hat precii viij s' non comparuit et cetera
Johannes Wod secundo die vocatus ad comparere faciendum Inwynum gardin ad sectam thome blyndseill'

Actio Simonis blabre aduersus Johannem howison' ponitur in dilacione propter debilitatem curie
usque hodie ad quindenam absque preiudicio
Willelmus adeson' tercio die vocatus ad sectam thome de marr' non comparuit et cetera

the assise ordanit that give Will of straloch' grauntis quhen he cummys hame
that his land was ser John' pettynwynis befor quhissonday gib mason' sal pay
the quhissondai male s to the said ser John' / and for this next yher' xij s'

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem decimo die mensis
Julij Anno gracie et cetera xlvijo quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata absentes patent
et cetera

Eodem die Willelmus adeson' in amerciamento curie pro iniusta detencione quindecim solidorum
a thoma de marr' et ad satisfaciendum eidem thome infra terminum Juris

Johannes Wode in amerciamento curie pro iniusta porrectione plegij super Johannem spens
seriendum quod ipse fraudelenter absentauit a se vnum hominem debent' sibi certam summam
farine
Idem Johannes Wode posuit se in voluntate balliuorum pro perturbacione curie

Ingramus de crois super quem Willelmus Windissor' carpentarius porrexit plegium pro
iniusta detencione sex ouium et firmarum earundem vnius anni sepe vocatus non comparuit
tanquam primo die huius processus et ideo precipitur et cetera

The assiss' has fundyn' that Johne the Waus' distrobillit the court in presens of
the bailyeis and the dome delayit as yett

Johannes Waus der has fundin Johne of scrogis the fadir law borch' that Johne Wode
and his party sal be vnscathit of him and his party bot as comown' law will

Item Johne Wode has fundyn mwrthow of glastir law borch that Johne the Waus and
his party sal be sca vnscathit of him and his party et cetera

The samyn day Adam ledale has fundin Johne Wode law borch' that henry
payntour' and his party sal be vnscathit of him and his party bot as cours' of commoune
law

Item henry payntour' has fundin Johne Kymdy law borch' that adam ledale and his
party sall be vnharmyt and vnscathit of him and his party bot as law will

Robertus lurdane sepe vocatus ad sectam symonis blabir' non comparuit tanquam secundo die
huius processus et ideo et cetera

Memorandum that the bailyeis in playne court chargit Dauy meignes be the chawmerlaynis
letter to content and pay D thome of stan of the somme of a twapart of a sarplar' of woll
and to mak him reknyng tharof be wate in flandris and thar in presens of thaim the saide
Dauy meignes perofferit wilfully to fulfill all the contentis of the saide chawmerlay
nis letter

The actione o mowit betuix thome blindsele and Inwyne of gardin is resplaytyt to
the next court but preiudice of ony party

Item William of stralouch' deponit be the gret athe that his lande lyande in the schipraw
was sere Johne of pettynwinez befor Witsonday and at gilbert mason' sal content the
said sere Johne of the mal' of it as the rolment schawis of befor'

Actio Symonis blabir' aduersus Johannem howyson' ponitur in dilacione propter debilitatem
curie vsque ad hodie ad quindenam et cetera and gif the said Johne howyson' cummys
hame befor' this terme the balyeis sall ger' the said' symon blabir' and Johne howyson'
remayn in the tolbuthe quhill thair' actione be endyt and full payment made to
thaim that wantis

Item robertus carmage de colly super quem Symon blabir' porrexit plegium pro iniusta
detencione ab ipso de xlta s' sepe vocatus ad sectam ipsius symonis tanquam primo die
huius processus non comparuit et ideo et cetera

Donaldus blakburne secundo die sepe vocatus ad sectam patricij quhite non comparuit
et ideo precipitur et cetera

Actio mota inter robertum stephani et Willelmum huntar' respectuatur vsque ad hodie in
quindenam absque preiudicio

The actione mowit betuix Dauid meignes and William andirson is resplaytit to the
hame cummyn of Johne howyson' and than the saide Dauid sall profe that William andirson
is content of iiijor li' ix d' that he come borche to the said William for a franx man
and he sall be quyt and gif he dois nocht within xv dayis eftir his hame cummyn
he sall content him of the said' iiijor li' ix d'

Ada relicta quondam andree Joneson' sepe vocata ad sectam thome filii andree pro iniusta
detencione octodecim marcarum de bonis domini Johannis andree capellani fratris dicti thome
sibi iure hereditario contingent' tanquam primo die huius processus non comparuit et ideo precipitur et cetera
thomas flescharis in amerciamento pro iniusta fractione precij de vendicione carnium et cetera
Robertus filius Willelmi lowson' in amerciamento curie pro eadem causa
thomas gray in amerciamento curie eadem de causa

William baxtar' and Johne litstar' has complenyeit apon' Johne rede and on adam
litstar' to the bailyeis that thai wrangwysly occupyis thair' craft and nocht fre
men

Willame of spaigne has fundin William of marr' law borch' that thome quelp and his party
sal be vnscathit of him and his party bot as cours' of comown' law will'

Curia legalis burgi de abirdene tenta per balliuos in pretorio eiusdem xxiiijto die mensis Julij
Anno gracie Mmo ccccmo xlvijo quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata absentes patent et cetera

Eodem die robertus lurdane tanquam tercio die huius processus sepe vocatus ad sectam symonis blabir
non comparuit et ideo precipitur et cetera
Item Dauid hervy in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione Willelmi ledale et cetera

Item robertus carmage sepe vocatus ad sectam symonis blabir tanquam secundo die huius processus
non comparuit / et ideo precipitur sergiandis et cetera

Item Willelmus lambynton' carnifex in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione findelayi fleschar'
in verbis et cetera et dictus Willelmus inuenit henricum banerman plegium legalem pro se quod dictus finde
layus et pars eius tota erunt indempnes de de se et parte sua tota et cetera

Item findelaius fleschar' in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione Willelmi de lambynton' in verbis
et cetera et Inuenit robertum gillespy plegium legalem pro se quod idem Willelmus et pars eius tota
erunt indempnes et cetera

Item ada relicta quondam andree Joneson' secundo die sepe vocata ad sectam thome andree
fratris sui non comparuit et ideo precipitur et cetera

Item Ricardus de camera primo die sepe vocatus ad sectam Willelmi baxstar' super quem Idem Willelmus porrexit plegium pro iniusta deten
cione de lij s' marcis debitis pro tribus vlnis cum quarterio grecij panni de anglia sibi deliberat' per
vxorem meam non comparuit et ideo precipitur et cetera

Item Robertus fraser de skyberdy primo die sepe vocatus ad sectam thome de stane super quem idem thomas porrexit plegium pro
iniusta detencione duodecim s' et quinque d' pro quibus ipse deuenit fideiussor et de
bitor principalis sibi pro roberto de Irwine non comparuit et ideo precipitur sergiandis et cetera
plegio pro dicto Roberto gilberto meignes

Item robertus lambert primo die sepe vocatus ad sectam Johannis mathyson' et super quem
idem Johannes porrexit plegium quod ipse robertus iniuste detenet a se duodecem s' et tres
d' per me sibi accomodatis non comparuit et ideo precipitur et cetera

Item the actione mowit betuix vmfray of laiske and William baxtar' the assise has ordanit
that vmfray laiske sall profe lauchfully that he deliueryt to Will baxtar' xj hamburgh barellis
of salmunde the next lauchfull day and than the saide Will baxtar' sall mak the said'
vmfray count and reknyng of the said' xj hamburgh barellis and full payment the quhilke
gif the said vmfray prowis nocht at the said' day the forsaid' William baxtar' is
quyt of his clayme of the forsaid' xj hamburgh barellis of salmunde

Item Dauy hervy has fundin Wat mwdy lach-borch' that William ledale sall be vnscathit
of him and his part bot as law will'

Item Will ledale has fundin law borch' Johne of scrog' the fadir for him and his part that
Dauy hervy and his part sall be vnscathit bot as cours' of commoune lawe will

Item marioune' gammyle in amercyament of this curt for the wrangwis' distrobilling
of quhorlay be hir' awne graunte et cetera
Item Johannes Etale in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione mariote gammile et cetera

Item canny quhorlay in amercyament for the wrangwis' distrobillance of marioune
gammile and til amend' til hir' as law will'

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xijo die mensis augusti Anno
Domini et cetera xlvijmo quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata absentes patent et cetera
Eodem die Willelmus howate in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione Anabelle Wormate et cetera
Item dicta anabella Wormate in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione dicti Willelmi howate et cetera
Curia ballivorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem quarto die mensis septembris

Quo die it wes fundyn be ane assiss' that the paper deliuerit be thomas
the stan' be Dawy menyes is sufficiand saffand that the said Dawy' menyes sal restor and ask
to the said thomas of stan' the ij s' g' tan' for his fe and anent the lay remayn
it sal stand as the act' giffwyn out be gret assiss' in the chawmer ayr mad' thar
anent the twa part of the siluer of j sarplar of woll' sald be the said Dawy

Memorandum that because of before quhilum Dauid clerk in his life and liege poustee in to
the tolbuth' befor the balyheis of this burgh' in playne courte grauntit
him to be awand to James blyndseil xxvj lib' xj s' / the baylyhe John' of
Scrogs chargeit him to mak payment of the said soume within' xv
daijs folowand / the quhilkis xv daijs bipast the payment vnmade
the said Dauy' askit / y instantly at the said balyhe othir' xv daijs
to mak the said payment / for the quhilk lelely and treuly to be
made for mar' hab habundance the said Dauy drew his land the quhilk
he duelt in / to borch' to forsaid balyhes / And because syne the said
Dauid happynnit to discess' the said payment vnpaijt / the forsaid
balyhe passit to the said land the last day of septembre the yher' of
grace et cetera xlvij and deliuerit that sammyn land to the said Jamys
blyndseil to be adiornaijt and sald for the said soume as law will
witnes' John' of fife than aldirman John' of Kintor ane of the balyheis
Androw ayncroft patrik badenach' / thom blyndseil Will voket Robert massy
and paton' piot a seriand'

Curia Capitalis burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem secundo die mensis
octobris videlicet die lune proximo post festum beati michaelis Archangeli Anno
Domini Mmo CCCCmo xlvij / Quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata absentes
patent in Rotulo sectarum

Eodem die Willelmus scherar' electus fuit in officium prepositi huius burgi
Johannes voket Johannes gray patricius fife et thomas Kintor electi fuerunt
in officia balliuorum / Et Johannes spens macolmus Dacre Willelmus atkynson' et
patricius piot electi fuerunt in officia seriendorum siue bidellorum huius burgi
pro vno anno futuro prestito solito Juramento

Item eodem die de mandato balliuorum macolmus Dacre seriendus distringebat Johannem
Wood et Andream Rede pro eo quod non fecerunt Johannem chene Willelmum chene patricium
merschale et thomam Robertson' comparere prout obligati fuerunt / et precepit quod facerent
eosdem comparere coram balliuis huius burgi in pretorio in proxima curia legali ad sectam
et ad instanciam domini Alexandri de Irwyne domini de Drum militis responsurus et
Juri periturus et cetera

Item eodem die p de consensu parcium processus domini Willelmi de camera penes terram gilbertj
Sanchar' ponitur in dilacione usque proximam curiam legalem in eodem statu in quo
nunc est absque preiudicio alicuius partis

Item eodem die accedens ad barram magistri thomas Edname et Walterus foularton'
canonicj ecclesie abirdonensis protestati fuerunt procuratorio nomine capituli eiusdem pro vno
annuo redditu vj s' et viij d' eisdem canonicis et capitulo debitis de quadam terra
vasta vt supra ad quam accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides
quos presentauit in curia tanquam die huius processus testibus Johanne howison' Ricardo
stephani et macolmo Dacre seriendo cum alijs

Item Johannes de Scrogs pater protestatus fuit pro vno annuo redditu xx s' sibi
et Willelmo Wodman debit' annuatim de quadam terra et cetera vt supra ad quam accedens
nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos presentauit in curia
tanquam pri secundo die huius processus testibus Jacobo blyndseil thome androuson' et macolmo
Dacre seriendo cum alijs et cetera

div.head: Assisa ad Inquisiciones
div.p:
Johannes Scrogs pater Andreas ayncroft Duncanus patrikson' Dauid symson' alexander
Cryne Robertus baroune Johannes henrison' Willelmus maliceson' Willelmus coly Walterus
giffard et Johannes howison / Qui Jurati dicunt quod

Item eodem die accedens ad barram Johannes Scrogs pater prelocutor Jacobi blyndseil / terram
quondam Dauid clerk qui alias sibi liberata fuit pro xxvj lib' xj s' per balliuos adi
adiurnandos tanquam primo die huius processus optulit venalem propinquioribus amicis

Item eodem die personaliter comparuerunt henricus bonar' Ciues Sanctiandree ex vna et
dominus Alexander Irwyne dominus de Drum miles procurator litteratorie constitutus et procuratorio
nomine Andree broisour' partibus ex altera / et idem Andreas sepe vocatus fuit ad
probandum legittime prout alias manucepit / dampna et expensas que et quas
alligauit se sustinuisse per complices siue homines Johannis skyng occasione
quatuor celdrarum brasij mensure ville berwici super twedam carcat' ibidem per
Robertum Kerr' anglicum liberandum prefato henrico bonar' vt supra scribitur / non comparuit
et tamen probacionem huiusmodi non produxit per se vel procuratorem predictum / quapropter dictus
henricus bonar extendit plegium quod ad suam deuenit calumpniam aduersus
dictum Andream de predictis quatuor l celdris brasij in defectu probacionis predicte
quam in ista curia obligatus fuit producere / quod plegius prefatus dictus alexander
Irwyne nomine quo supra recontrariauit alligans dictum Andream a dicta probacione
solutum pro eo quod dictus henricus plegios de prosequendum In presentem causam alias
dare vt asseruit recusauit / Et demum partibus remotis et curia mature
auisata decreuit et legittima hora diei exspectata datum fuit pro Judicio
per os Andree Crukschank Judicatoris curie quod in defectu probacionis predicte
prefatus henricus bonar' deuenit ad calumpniam suam aduersus dictum Andream
penes dictas quatuor celdras brasij vel precium eiusdem et adiudicatur easdem
dictus Andreas easdem prefato henrico satisfacere vel precium earundem infra
terminum Juris / et idem andreas in amerciamento curie pro iniusta recontrariacione plegij
supradicti et cetera

Item eodem die perlectis tribus processibus ductis per Johannem blendseil decretum fuit per curiam et datum pro iudicio
per os andree crukschank iudicatoris curie quod dictus Johannes optiniuit et recuperauit possessionem proprietatem cuiusdam
terre Jacentis in parte australi vici castri inter communionem viam qua itur usque futy et terram roberti gyllespy ex parte
orientali prout extendit in longitudine a communi via regia usque Borrum vsque ad torrentem sancte trinitatis
vsque austrum et terram quondam rogeri filij vilelmj ex parte occidentali in defectu solucionis cuiusdam annuj
redditus vi s' sibi de dicta terra debito et a longo tempore non solut'

Item vmfredus lask in amerciamento curie pro iniusta recontrariacione plegij extense per andream alanson'
procuratorem vilelmj baxtar et idem vilelmus quitus a calumpnia dicti vmifridi de xj hamburgh barralis
salmonum salsorum pro eo quod non probauit isto die recepcione earundem barrallarum prout alias manucepit
perpetuo sibi desuper imposito silencio

Item idem vmfridus dedit gilbertum sankchar' plegium legalem quod dictus vilelmus et pars sua tota
erunt indempnes pro eo et parte sua aliter quam per viam Juris

Item eodem die accedens ad barram dominus robertus pattonson procurator fratris Dauid minister domus
fratrum sancte trinitatis huius burgi protestatus fuit pro quodam annuo redditu v solidorum eidem domuj
debit' annuatim de quadam terra vasta Jacente ex parte occidentali vici inferioris ecclesie inter terram
alexandri de camray ex parte borialy et terram vilelmj eldar ex parte australi ad quam accedens
nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos presentauit in curia tanquam primo die huius processus
testibus vilelmo fytchat thoma andirson macolmo Dackar' sargyando cum aliis

Item idem dominus robertus nomine quo supra protestatus fuit pro quodam annuo redditu trium solidorum et
iiijor d' eidem domuj debitis annuatim de quadam terra vasta jacente ex parte australi vici de ly
greyn inter terram adee sprwnt ex parte orientali ex vna et ly Denbwrn ex parte
occidentali partibus ex altera ad quam accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides
quos presentauit in curia tanquam primo die huius processus testibus eisdem supradictis

Curia balliuorum tenta per balliuos in pretorio eiusdem nono die mensis octobris anno Domini
Mo cccco xlo septimo

Quo die Johannes bullok in amerciamento curie pro eo quod iniuste detulit a cornilj magistro nauis residium
nauli suj ad summam sex librarum et vltra et facto competo satisfaciet eidem infra terminum Juris et cetera

Item assisa inuenit iohannes de fyff Duncanus clat recardus Kyntor et Johannes stephanj quilibet eorum
tenetur carcare vnum quarterium nauis cornilij sicut in conductione eiusdem obligati fuerunt et idem cornilius
ex sua spontenia voluntate publice quieteclamauit omnes et singulos mercatores qui imponere
veluit bona et mercandias in dicta naue sua non calumpniabit eos uel eorundem bona vltra quam pro naulo
suo eorundem bonorum et mercandiarum exceptis tam prefata johannem fyff Duncano clat recardo Kyntor
et Johanne stephanj et adhoc se fide mea obligauit et cetera

Item penes vnam barrellam salmonum quam Dauid anclach dicit Johanne bollok de naue
dicti cornilij recepisse idem cornilius et nauti suj purgabunt se per eorum Juramenta quod dicta bar
rella non est in sua naue nec est de eadem per eos ablata vel alienata qua purgacione facta dictus johannes
bollok satisfaciet dictam barrallam prefato Dauid Anclach infra terminum Juris et cetera
